articles.author: Clive Cookson
articles.title: Brain implant made from graphene is set to begin UK clinical trial - Financial Times
articles.description: Patients in Manchester will take part in first study using ‘wonder material’ that was discovered in the city
articles.content: The first brain implant made of graphene, hailed as a wonder material after its discovery at Manchester university 20 years ago, is set to begin a clinical trial in the city at the end of this month.… [+3444 chars]
